Genetic susceptibility has to do with hormones and chemical systems in the body that direct appetite, metabolism and the absorption of nutrients and fat.
One of those hormones is leptin.

Hamdy says the majority of people who are obese are resistant to leptin.
The brain is shielded from the information on how much fat you have in your body.

This is exactly what you like, this is what you love, continue to eat it.
